inspect[source]

inspect(*arrays, **kwargs)

shows shape, min, max and mean of an array/list/dict of oreys Usage:

inspect(arr1, arr2, arr3, [arr4,arr5,arr6], arr7, [arr8, arr9],...) where every arr is assume to have a .shape, .min, .max and .mean methods
